item.title: Famitsu Sales: 1/27/25 – 2/2/25
item.content:encoded:

  • PS4

  • Switch

Black Myth: Wukong physical edition opens at 10,136 copies sold.

Famitsu has published its estimated physical game software data for Japan for the week of January 27, 2025 to February 2, 2025.

Donkey Kong Country Returns HD for Switch remained the top selling game of the week, moving an additional 22,093 retail units.

The highest selling new release was the physical edition of Black Myth: Wukong, which launched at 10,136 copies sold. It was followed by Cardfight!! Vanguard Dear Days 2 for Switch, which opened at 8,980 retail units.

On the hardware side, the Switch family sold 44,341 units, the PlayStation 5 family sold 12,873 units, the Xbox Series family sold 3,070 units, and the PlayStation 4 family sold 19 units.

item.title: Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater launches August 28, leaked PlayStation Store trailer reveals
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/metal-gear-solid-delta-snake-eater-launches-august-28-leaked-playstation-store-trailer-reveals

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Plus, an appearance by the Ape Escape monkey.

Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater will launch on August 28, according to a trailer posted to PlayStation Store ahead of an official announcement. The game is announced to be coming to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam.

The end of the trailer teases an appearance by the monkey from Sony Interactive Entertainment‘s Ape Escape series, “and more” characters:

Here is an overview of the game, via PlayStation Store:

About

The core experience of the original, evolved and more immersive than ever.

A remake of the 2004 game Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater, with the same gripping story and engrossing world, now with all new graphics and 3D audio that enhance the jungle atmosphere. Get ready for the ultimate survival stealth action experience.

Key Features

  • Everything You Love, and More – The story, characters, voice acting, gameplay, and music that made the original a sensation return, remade for modern consoles. This evolutionary leap breathes new life into every cutscene, and rebuilds every corner of the world.
  • Authentic to Life Portrayals – The battle damage system has been upgraded, with the wear and tear of Snake’s clothes, as well as bruises and bullet wounds on his body, reflected in real time. Injuries will leave their mark on Snake’s body permanently, telling a story of each player’s unique journey through the game.
  • Deeply Immersive Experiences – Players can elect for a newly added, more modern control style. These intuitive controls let you focus entirely on the game, and the immersive thrills of the survival stealth experience. You can also choose to play with a classic control style that more closely recreates the feel of the original game.
  • Additional Game Modes
    • Snake vs. Monkey – In this mode, you’ll play as Snake, and round up all the escaped apes running amok in each stage!
    • And more to come…
